title: Other Agent Platforms with MCP Support
body_html:
Several agent platforms and frameworks have started to incorporate support for MCP (Model Context Protocol), indicating a growing trend towards standardized communication between AI agents and external systems. Some notable examples include:

  • mcp-agent: A framework specifically designed for building agents using MCP.
  • LastMile AI: This platform appears to have integrated MCP support, according to search results.
  • Dive: An open-source AI agent desktop application with MCP integration.
  • LangChain: There's evidence of MCP server integration with LangChain, suggesting its use in agent development.

This suggests that rather than reinventing the wheel, we might be able to leverage existing libraries or frameworks that already handle MCP communication, potentially simplifying the integration process with Letta.
